Package pgrid

Interface Summary
DataTypeHandler Deprecated.  
ExactQueryInterface Deprecated.  
QueryInterface Deprecated.  
RangeQueryInterface Deprecated.  
XMLDataItem This interface represents an XMLDataItem
XMLizable This interface defines methods and fields required by classes to be created from an XML string and to produce an XML string to represent themself.
 

Class Summary
AbstractQuery This class represents a query message.
Constants This class represents all global constants.
DataItem This class represents a shared Gridella file.
Exchange This class represents a P-Grid Exchange.
GUID This class stores unique IDs and provides some basic access methods.
Host This class represents a host of the P-Grid Network.
PGridHost This class represents a host of the P-Grid Network.
PGridKey  
PGridKeyRange  
PGridServer Starts the P-Grid in server mode.
Properties This class represents the application properties.
Query This class represents a query message.
QueryReply This class represents a query reply.
RangeQuery This class represent a range query message
Statistics This class represents the statistics of P-Grid.
Type This class represents an unknown data item type.
